title: Prince’s Band the Revolution Announce Tour
text:
Prince’s Band the Revolution Announce Tour The iconic Purple Rain lineup hit the road this spring Prince Photo by ABC Photo Archives/ABC via Getty Images 
Last fall, Prince ’s iconic backing band the Revolution performed a series of reunion shows . They have now announced a spring tour featuring stops in four U.S. cities. See their itinerary below. The touring lineup will be the one from the Purple Rain -era, Billboard reports . During the ‘80s, the band was credited on three of Prince’s studio albums: Purple Rain (1984) , Around the World in a Day (1985), and Parade (1986). Members of the band also played on 1982’s 1999 .
